title: TiKV panic when startup
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
v5.2.1

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->
Ali cloud OS, 32 CPU

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
Deploy the cluster, and tikv can't start 
### What did you expect?
the cluster running normal 
### What did happened?
TiKV panic with error:
![微信图片_20211012143555](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17038907/136904454-2f124a7a-ad57-42bd-9823-eaea237f9280.jpg)

/proc/self/mountinfo:
![20211012-143923](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17038907/136904741-36200402-04be-42ba-b0b3-8dfe9c2b8a3d.jpeg)
